title: Active Galactic Nuclei - A Journey to the Center
speaker: Michael Karkar
blurb: When we think of space, many of us think of galaxies. These massive gravity-bound collections of matter not only look beautiful, they also each have a unique heart - their galactic nuclei. In this show, we will look through the different types of galactic centers and galaxies, discuss how galaxies function, and connect our newfound understanding to our own home galaxy, the Milky Way.
